title: Lanterns Chinoises (Chinese Lanterns)
marks: Signature, inscription LRC, in pencil: [(illegible) W. Saget./ Alex. Luno
description: one standing woman and one kneeling woman, hanging large round orange lanterns over a balcony; city scene with fireworks at R; books and artist\'s palette and brushes, LLC; pencil sketch of reclining nude on back- very small
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones
